name: THE SHOW MUST GO ON (Malte A)
name_original: THE SHOW MUST GO ON (Malte A)
description: "THE SHOW MUST GO ON" is a game about a bad party-but it's you're job to make it a great night! You'll need to make music, get beer and mix drinks, this will make awesome people join you're party! (The number of guest represants the score)
